The Stephen Siller Tunnel to Towers Foundation is a non-profit organization established in honor of firefighter Stephen Siller, who heroically lost his life while responding to the September 11th attacks. Driven by a profound commitment to service, the foundation aims to honor the sacrifices of first responders and veterans by providing support to their families and communities.

The Foundation’s Mission and Programs

The Stephen Siller Tunnel to Towers Foundation is guided by a mission to honor the sacrifices of first responders and veterans by providing support to their families and communities. The foundation accomplishes this through a range of programs and initiatives, including:

  • The Tunnel to Towers Foundation Gold Star Family Home Program:This program provides mortgage-free homes to the surviving spouses and children of first responders and military service members who died in the line of duty. The foundation has built and donated hundreds of homes across the country, providing a tangible symbol of support and stability to grieving families.

  • The Tunnel to Towers Foundation Fallen First Responder Home Program:This program provides mortgage-free homes to families of first responders who died in the line of duty, regardless of their time of service. This program ensures that these families have a place to call home, free from the burden of a mortgage.

  • The Tunnel to Towers Foundation Smart Home Program:This program provides state-of-the-art smart homes to severely injured veterans, enabling them to live with greater independence and dignity. The smart homes are equipped with cutting-edge technology that helps veterans with mobility, communication, and daily living tasks.
  • The Tunnel to Towers Foundation First Responder Family Support Program:This program provides financial assistance to the families of first responders who are injured or killed in the line of duty. The program helps families with essential expenses, such as medical bills, living expenses, and educational costs.
  • The Tunnel to Towers Foundation Building for America Program:This program provides financial assistance to organizations that are building homes for veterans and first responders. The program supports organizations that are working to address the housing needs of these heroes.
